QuestData.Title: The Kunzen Legend-Chief
QuestData.Description: I've heard people talk about the hozen like they're just some tribe of barely-functional idiots... but that's not true! They have brains, too - they just don't all like to use them that much.$b$bI've heard that the Kunzen tribe has two chiefs - one in charge of fighting, and one in charge of stories, lore, and history.$b$bWhat I wouldn't give to see what kind of stories they tell...
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: I don't know what his name will be - they regularly elect new legend-chiefs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Kunzen Legend-Book from a Kunzen Legend-Chief.
